description:
Los Angeles-area medical professionals facing legal challenges have a firm and steady advocate in Chapman Law Group. A nationally recognized law firm with an office in North Hollywood, Chapman Law Group focuses on health care and the people who work in the industry. Its attorneys have decades of combined experience.

Whether you are a physician, nurse, or pharmacist, you will receive the necessary legal guidance when confronted by challenges that may threaten your career and livelihood. The attorneys of Chapman Law Group have represented hundreds of health care clients. The team has fought for them to maintain their professional licenses, provided guidance on regulatory compliance matters, represented them in medical malpractice situations, and defended them against criminal charges.

Since 1985, Chapman Law Group has followed the steady legal hand of its founder Ronald W. Chapman Sr. The experienced and aggressive attorneys also have represented clients in cases related to health care fraud, correctional health care facility defense, defense in health care audits, corporate transactions and health care employment matters.

When you retain Chapman Law Group, here are some of the crucial benefits you get:

  • Several attorneys who earned a Master of Law degree in health law from Loyola University Chicago School of Law. The institution is considered the country's best school in health law studies.
  • A law firm that includes attorneys recognized by their peers as among the best in the region. Founder Ronald W. Chapman Sr. made the Super Lawyers list four times, most recently in 2021. The Rising Stars list has welcomed Ronald W. Chapman II in six consecutive years from 2015 through 2020 as well as Wedad Suleiman in 2021.
  • A group of esteemed attorneys who work together nationwide in four U.S. offices. Chapman Law Group is based in Troy, Michigan, and has three other branches in Sarasota and Miami, Florida as well as in North Hollywood, California.

Chapman Law Group has a firm understanding of the health care industry and the challenges faced by any medical professional. Its attorneys bring the confidence, knowledge, and energy to represent you until resolution.
